entry.name: showLocalTimezone
entry.label: Whether the timezone should be displayed when the clock is showing the local timezone.

entry.name: showSeconds
entry.label: Whether seconds should be shown in the clock.

entry.name: showDate
entry.label: Whether the date should be shown next to the clock.

entry.name: dateFormat
entry.label: The date format to display. Options are: shortDate, longDate, isoDate or custom.

entry.name: fontFamily
entry.label: Font family. e.g "arial". The system font is used if this is not set.

entry.name: selectedTimeZones
entry.label: A list of the configured time zones. Format is "Europe/London". Special entry "Local" indicates system time zone.

entry.name: lastSelectedTimezone
entry.label: When multiple time zones are configured, this is the one shown on widget restore. Typically the system's current timezone.

entry.name: wheelChangesTimezone
entry.label: Whether the mouse wheel switches between the timezones configured in selectedTimeZones.

entry.name: displayTimezoneFormat
entry.label: Whether the timezone is displayed as a code i.e. "GMT", full text i.e. "London" or UTC offset "+1".

entry.name: showWeekNumbers
entry.label: Whether the calendar should show week numbers.

entry.name: use24hFormat
entry.label: Force the clock to use 12/24 hour time, instead of following the user locale.

entry.name: firstDayOfWeek
entry.label: Force the calendar to use a specific week day as first day of a week. -1 means follow user locale, 0 is Sunday, 1 is Monday, etc.

entry.name: enabledCalendarPlugins
entry.label: A list of plugins where additional calendar event data can be sourced.

entry.name: pin
entry.label: Whether the popup should remain open when another window is activated

entry.name: dateDisplayFormat
entry.label: Whether the date should be shown below or beside the time
